title: Publish readiness: footer copyright + deployment guide

requirements.summary: Replace dynamic footer year with the exact static text “© 2026 Vaibhav Gaikwad” while keeping all existing footer links and attribution intact.
acceptanceCriteria: The year is not derived from the current date
No other footer content is unintentionally removed or broken (social links still work)

file_operations.description: Remove the runtime-derived year logic and render the footer copyright line as the exact static string “© 2026 Vaibhav Gaikwad”, preserving all existing social links and attribution layout. This footer already uses shadcn-ui primitives (Button/Separator); keep their usage unchanged and verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Add a developer-friendly deployment guide documenting prerequisites and the commands to build and deploy the app to the Internet Computer with the existing frontend + single Motoko canister setup.
acceptanceCriteria: A new deployment documentation file exists in the repository
The guide includes clear build and deploy commands and prerequisite steps (e.g., installing dependencies, starting dfx, deploying)
Instructions are written in English and are specific enough for a developer to follow without additional context

file_operations.description: Create an English deployment guide covering prerequisites (DFX/Node), installing dependencies, local replica start, build, and deploy steps for the existing frontend + single Motoko canister project setup. Align steps with the repo’s ICP tooling/templates (e.g., github-export-icp-cli/build-template-react/core-infrastructure) and verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
